to change sides in a war/turncoat

definition: Baingoin county, Tibetan: Dpal mgon rdzong, in Nagchu prefecture 那曲地區|那曲地区[Na4 qu3 di4 qu1], central Tibet

sentences.english: This is an improved reliable socialist must face the problem.
sentences.chinese: 这也是戈德曼改良的可靠主义必须要面对的问题。

sentences.english: Gemengda Polaroid light chuckle, but no one o'clock refused to mean.
sentences.chinese: 戈明达宝丽轻笑道，却没有一点要拒绝的意思。

sentences.english: Dr Goldmeier uses the analogy of a man confronted by an angry tiger.
sentences.chinese: 戈德梅尔医生用一头愤怒的老虎来比喻一个男人。

sentences.english: Every day Goliath came near Saul's camp.
sentences.chinese: 每天戈利亚斯都到萨奥的军营附近。

sentences.english: The theft had happened many years ago, according to Gregorovitch.
sentences.chinese: 据格里戈维奇的记忆，这次失窃发生在许多年以前。

sentences.english: Captain Gordon was hurried off before I walked to him.
sentences.chinese: 在我走向戈登上尉之前，他就匆匆走开了。

sentences.english: Gobinda Babu of our school was very dark, and short and fat.
sentences.chinese: 我们学校的戈文达先生是一位皮肤黝黑的矮胖子。

sentences.english: Costa, meanwhile, resumed his role as Flamengo coach.
sentences.chinese: 这期间科斯塔重新当上了弗拉门戈主教练。

sentences.english: Valarey Gevardarsky is with the 110th fire brigade.
sentences.chinese: 戈瓦达尔斯基是第110消防旅的。

sentences.english: Gortat is not only tough and physical, but he can also score.
sentences.chinese: 戈塔特不仅仅是强壮，他还能得分。

sentences.english: "It's the enemy of mindfulness, " says McGonigal.
sentences.chinese: 麦克戈尼格尔说，“多项工作是专注的敌人。”

sentences.english: Barry Goldwater IS the conscience of a conservative.
sentences.chinese: 戈德华特是一个保守的良知。
戈谭市需要一个真正的英雄。

sentences.english: Childrenpractice the art of flamenco at a fair in Barcelona.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在巴塞罗纳集市上练习弗拉门戈艺术。

sentences.english: But the lottery would come and Goldberg wouldn't win.
sentences.chinese: 可是开彩了，戈德堡没有中。

sentences.english: As a result, Gotals can read the surface impressions of each others' minds and emotions.
sentences.chinese: 因此，戈塔尔人可以解读彼此思想与感情的表象。

definition: solemn/reverent/calm/burial position in an ancestral tomb (old)/old variant of 默

to approach/to rise high/thick ice/to insult or maltreat
